mapper.insert: insert into sale_sheet (id, supplier, operator, remark, `state`, create_time, salesman, raw_total_amount, discount, final_amount, voucher_amount) values (#{id},#{supplier},#{operator},#{remark}, #{state}, #{createTime}, #{salesman}, #{rawTotalAmount}, #{discount}, #{finalAmount}, #{voucherAmount}) ;

insert into sale_sheet_content (sale_sheet_id, pid, quantity, unit_price, total_price, remark) values
(#{item.saleSheetId},#{item.pid},#{item.quantity},#{item.unitPrice},#{item.totalPrice},#{item.remark})
mapper.select: select * from sale_sheet order by id desc limit 0,1 ;

select c.id as id,c.type as type,c.level as level,c.name as name,c.phone as phone,c.address as address,c.zipcode as zipcode,c.email as email,c.line_of_credit as line_of_credit,c.receivable as receivable,c.payable as payable,c.operator as operator,sum(s.final_amount) as total_final_amount from sale_sheet s,customer c where s.salesman=#{salesman} and s.create_time>=#{beginTime} and s.create_time<=#{endTime} and s.supplier=c.id group by s.supplier order by total_final_amount limit 1;
